definition: to put the last hand to (a book, a film etc)/to finalize/to kill-green (a step in the processing of tea leaves)
to kill/to murder/to attack/to weaken or reduce/to smart (dialect)/(used after a verb) extremely
abbr. for 青海[Qing1 hai3], Qinghai Province
green/blue/black/youth/young (of people)

sentences.english: Did you start editing before having completed shooting three films?
sentences.chinese: 您在三部片子杀青前就开始剪接了吗？

sentences.english: WHAT a wrap party that's going to be.
sentences.chinese: 那将会是一个激动人心的杀青派对。

sentences.english: The cast and crew of Cranford finally wrap.
sentences.chinese: 克兰福德剧组终于杀青了。

sentences.english: It includes intelligent control of the cooling room to cool the tea leaves and deactivation of enzymes assisted by roller steam heat.
sentences.chinese: 它包括智能化调控凉青房凉青和滚筒汽热辅助杀青。

sentences.english: Every selling plan mdewoulse by him is impossible of execution.
sentences.chinese: 他所做的一切销售计画都是不能杀青的。

sentences.english: For that dream to come true a second time would be quite amazing.
sentences.chinese: 假使这样的梦能杀青第二次的话会多么了不起。

sentences.english: Yu says Wolf Totem, which has just wrapped production, is a perfect example.
sentences.chinese: 于冬认为近期杀青的《狼图腾》就是一个完美的例子。

sentences.english: The film is complete and ready for release.
sentences.chinese: 电影杀青并进入发行阶段。

definition: cast and crew/performers and production team

sequel/next episode (of TV series etc)

to check on sb at his workplace/to come to a movie set to visit one of the actors
to film/to shoot (a picture)
to direct (a film, play etc)
